Artists: there's a better way.

Level up your career. Learn how to build sales and a collector list from our marketing experts. Curate to sell with our friendly guidelines, and meet your next collector in our hip DTLA location just blocks from the LA Art Show, the country's highest-attended art fair.

A whole year of exhibitions in one weekend.

Get to Know Us

Founded by art collectors Alex Mitow and James Miille, Superfine! started out in 2015 as an alternative to boring, stuffy art shows and complicated art world politics. As it turned out, nobody cared about the art world and their politics. Our open and transparent approach worked: imaginations have been sparked and countless new collections have been jump-started at Superfine! fairs as we continue to spread our message of a more inclusive art market across the country. Since 2015, we‚Äôve had one goal: produce badass, expertly curated art shows where √ºber-talented, diverse global artists meet their new fans in iconic locations across the US and beyond.

For the second year in a row, Superfine! is returning to the bustling Union Market in Washington DC and we're inviting the cutting-edge of emerging talent to apply for a booth. Location: Union Market, 1309 5th St. NE, Washington, DC 20002
Fair dates: October 30 - November 3, 2019
Application deadline: September 4, 2019. We are more than 80% full and DC's fair is in very high demand, so apply soon to confirm your placement.

Here's what you can expect from Superfine! DC:
- 8-12,000 unique visitors during the five days of the fair.
- 25% of our visitors make a significant ($100-$2,500+) art purchase.
- An easy, efficient exhibition guided by our expert curators.

Benefits of Showing as a Collective
- Larger booth = greater impact + higher visibility.
- Split booth fees and share expenses among multiple artists.
- Build your platform to exhibit in future fairs around the world.

Note: A single collective member must be appointed for all financial and curatorial communications with the Superfine! team.
